title: Abuse by Bulgarian fans was appalling, but we kid ourselves if we think racism has been eradicated here
text:
The racist chanting by Bulgarian fans during England’s European Championship qualifier in Sofia has rightly been condemned. Television pictures showed black-shirted thugs, some giving the Nazi salute, behind the outrage.

The England team, especially the players against whom the abuse was aimed, behaved professionally and with dignity in difficult circumstances. They gave the best response possible by beating their opponents 6-0.

We need to be careful before condemning an entire nation for the antics of a few morons. There were attacks on Bulgaria after the game that were no more justified than they would have been on Britain at the height of football yobbery here.
